title: [Large-Scale] Innovating Accounting Education through Technology: Gamification and Practice-Centered Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Accounting Principles and Excel Proficiency
context.additional_context: Accounting education design incorporating gamification and storytelling in a smartphone-based limited-technology environment.

learning_goals: Learners can perform financial statement analysis simulations via a gamification mobile app with at least 80% accuracy.
Based on storytelling case studies, learners can propose three or more accounting risk management strategies.
Learners can complete practical tasks analyzing real corporate data using cloud-based accounting software.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
